26 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_TILE_INTERFACE_SHIFT_H__INCLUDED
27 #define TILEDARRAY_TILE_INTERFACE_SHIFT_H__INCLUDED
28 
29 #include "../type_traits.h"
30 #include "cast.h"
31 
32 namespace TiledArray {
33 
35 
41 template <typename Arg, typename Index>
42 inline auto shift(const Arg& arg, const Index& range_shift) {
43  return arg.shift(range_shift);
44 }
45 
47 
53 template <typename Arg, typename Index>
54 inline auto shift_to(Arg& arg, const Index& range_shift) {
55  return arg.shift_to(range_shift);
56 }
57 
58 namespace tile_interface {
59 
60 using TiledArray::shift;
61 using TiledArray::shift_to;
62 
63 template <typename T>
64 using result_of_shift_t = typename std::decay<decltype(
65  shift(std::declval<T>(), std::declval<std::vector<long> >()))>::type;
66 
67 template <typename T>
68 using result_of_shift_to_t = typename std::decay<decltype(
69  shift_to(std::declval<T>(), std::declval<std::vector<long> >()))>::type;
70 
71 template <typename Result, typename Arg, typename Enabler = void>
72 class Shift {
73  public:
74  typedef Result result_type;
75  typedef Arg argument_type;
76 
77  template <typename Index>
78  result_type operator()(const argument_type& arg,
79  const Index& range_shift) const {
80  return shift(arg, range_shift);
81  }
82 };
83 
84 template <typename Result, typename Arg>
85 class Shift<Result, Arg,
86  typename std::enable_if<
87  !std::is_same<Result, result_of_shift_t<Arg> >::value>::type>
88  : public TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_shift_t<Arg> > {
89  private:
90  typedef TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_shift_t<Arg> > Cast_;
91 
92  public:
93  typedef Result result_type;
94  typedef Arg argument_type;
95 
96  template <typename Index>
97  result_type operator()(const argument_type& arg,
98  const Index& range_shift) const {
99  return Cast_::operator()(shift(arg, range_shift));
100  }
101 };
102 
103 template <typename Result, typename Arg, typename Enabler = void>
104 class ShiftTo {
105  public:
106  typedef Result result_type;
107  typedef Arg argument_type;
108 
109  template <typename Index>
110  result_type operator()(argument_type& arg, const Index& range_shift) const {
111  return shift_to(arg, range_shift);
112  }
113 };
114 
115 template <typename Result, typename Arg>
116 class ShiftTo<Result, Arg,
117  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<
118  Result, result_of_shift_to_t<Arg> >::value>::type>
119  : public TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_shift_to_t<Arg> > {
120  private:
121  typedef TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_shift_to_t<Arg> > Cast_;
122 
123  public:
124  typedef Result result_type;
125  typedef Arg argument_type;
126 
127  template <typename Index>
128  result_type operator()(argument_type& arg, const Index& range_shift) const {
129  return Cast_::operator()(shift_to(arg, range_shift));
130  }
131 };
132 
133 template <typename Arg, typename Enabler = void>
134 struct shift_trait {
135  typedef Arg type;
136 };
137 
138 template <typename Arg>
139 struct shift_trait<Arg, typename std::enable_if<TiledArray::detail::is_type<
140  result_of_shift_t<Arg> >::value>::type> {
141  typedef result_of_shift_t<Arg> type;
142 };
143 
144 } // namespace tile_interface

152 template <typename Result, typename Arg>
153 class Shift : public TiledArray::tile_interface::Shift<Result, Arg> {};

161 template <typename Result, typename Arg>
162 class ShiftTo : public TiledArray::tile_interface::ShiftTo<Result, Arg> {};
